column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I arrived at the salon and walked inside .
#text=At the front counter was a receptionist who asked me if I had an appointment .
#text=I did have an appointment that I scheduled for that day .
#text=She let me know that my hairdresser would be ready for me in a few minutes , so I sat down in the lobby and read a magazine for a few minutes .
#text=I found a picture of a short hairstyle that I really liked .
#text=When my hairdresser came to the lobby to get me , I showed her the picture of the haircut that I wanted .
#text=She said that it would be an easy job with my thick hair .
#text=I followed her back to the salon area , and she motioned for me to take a seat in a big chair .
#text=I sat down , and she put a cape around my shoulders to prevent hair from sticking to my clothes .
#text=She brought over a cart with a small tub on it , and told me to lean my neck back while she washed my hair .
#text=After shampooing my hair , she rinsed it out with water and put it up in a towel to let it dry .
#text=She rolled the cart away and came back with a comb and pair of scissors , and combed through my hair .
#text=She applied a special creme to my hair to help nourish it , and then started snipping away .
#text=Long pieces of my hair fell all around me to the floor .
#text=She turned my chair around so she could reach the hair in the front of my head , and when she was done she washed her scissors off .
#text=Then , she dried my hair with a blow dryer and my haircut was fully revealed .
#text=She took the cape off of me and we chatted for a bit about our days and I thanked her .
#text=I returned to the receptionist to pay with my credit card .
